summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Post Street, from the north margin of Marion Street to the south margin of Madison Street, and from the north margin of Madison Street to the south margin of Seneca Street, all in the City of Seattle, by replanking the same, in accordance with Resolution No. 679 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle, approved December 6, 1899.
